issue.title: [Python] Add support for RelWithDebInfo
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17488](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17488). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Add support for RelWithDebInfo in the PyArrow build process defined in setup.py.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17488?focusedCommentId=17582920) by David Li (lidavidm):*
Also see ARROW-17099

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17488?focusedCommentId=17582942) by Alenka Frim (alenka):*
Oh, missed that, thanks!
It looks to me like it's a duplicate so I will close this issue as a duplicate of ARROW-17099.
